 DzOGLDefaultShader ()

Detailed Description

Implementation of a special render-only scene shader that applies default material parameters.

Member Function Documentation

void DzOGLDefaultShader::clearShadowMap (  )  const

Called by the scene during rendering to clear the settings for the shadow map.

bool DzOGLDefaultShader::needsBump (  )  const
Returns:
true if the shader is applying a bump map to the current material and expects the object to provide bump map vectors for each vertex.
